document.full_text: kohl's corp  reported a higher quarterly profit as the mid-price department store chain kept gross margins steady despite rising cotton prices, and the retailer raised its full-year profit forecast.
document.title: kohl's raises outlook; margins steady
lines_and_colors: kohl's corp  reported a higher quarterly profit as the mid-price department store chain kept gross margins steady despite rising cotton prices, and the retailer raised its full-year profit forecast.
